turns.context:
Student: Thank you, I am! But I also feel a bit overwhelmed. I've never managed a team before and I'm not sure if I have what it takes to be a good leader.
Teacher: Don't doubt yourself, you wouldn't have been promoted if your boss didn't believe in your abilities. And I'm sure with your hard work and dedication, you'll do a great job leading your team.
Student: I hope so. It's just a big responsibility and I don't want to let anyone down.
turns.input: I hope so. It's just a big responsibility and I don't want to let anyone down.
turns.ground_truth: It's understandable to feel that way, but remember that you have the support and resources of your company and your colleagues. And if you ever need any help or advice, don't hesitate to ask me or anyone else you trust.

quality_scores.reason: The response is a natural continuation of the conversation, provides substantial support and advice, and clearly reflects the teacher's supportive and guiding persona.

turns.context:
